tool_description: Checks inventory availability across multiple warehouse locations for replacement orders and restocking decisions.

sku_list.description: List of SKUs to check inventory for

warehouse_locations.description: Specific warehouse locations to check, or 'all' for all locations

minimum_quantity.description: Minimum quantity required to consider item as available

error_messages: Invalid SKU format: One or more SKUs are not in the correct format.
Warehouse not found: One or more specified warehouse locations do not exist.
Too many SKUs: Maximum 200 SKUs allowed per request.
Database connection error: Unable to connect to inventory system, please retry.
usage: Provide sku_list with items to check. Optionally specify warehouse_locations and minimum_quantity thresholds. The tool returns availability data for all requested items across specified locations.

inventory_results.description: Inventory status for each SKU with quantities and locations

total_available_skus.description: Number of SKUs that meet minimum quantity requirements

warehouse_summary.description: Summary of inventory levels by warehouse location
